name: You've got a New Message
description:
You're a theatre producer. Success is your name. 

You need a job. Someone gives you a job.

Someone is Dragon. From Goodream Theatre.

Disclaimer

This is a work of fiction. The story, all names, characters, and incidents portrayed in this production are fictitious. Any resemblance to actual persons, living or dead, or actual events is purely coincidental. No beings (Land or Ocean or in Dream) were harmed in the making of this fiction. 

This work was initially created as a birthday gift for Success. A massive thank you to our friends (especially Ferandi as Red Panda) and all our testplayers.

References:

Pokemon Battle Scene Creator https://pbsc.imdevinc.com/

H. P. Lovecraft, The Call of Cthulhu, https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Call_of_Cthulhu

Portrait of Red Panda https://www.zooportraits.com/

Musicals:

A Chorus Line

Mary Poppins

Dear Evan Hansen
